code: import axios from'axios';var backendUrl='https://immense-cliffs-96286.herokuapp.com/api/persons';var getAll=function getAll(){return axios.get(backendUrl).then(function(response){return response.data;});};var create=function create(newPerson){return axios.post(backendUrl,newPerson).then(function(response){return response.data;});};var update=function update(id,updatedPerson){return axios.put("".concat(backendUrl,"/").concat(id),updatedPerson).then(function(response){return response.data;});};var del=function del(id){return axios.delete("".concat(backendUrl,"/").concat(id)).then(function(response){return response.data;});};export default{getAll:getAll,create:create,update:update,del:del};
